article.title: Bakersfield U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Bakersfield U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​​

Kern Office Contact Information

Bakersfield U.S. Export Assistance Center
2100 Chester Ave., 1st Floor Suite 110
Bakersfield, California 93301​
Phone: 661-637-0136
Fax: 661-637-0156
Email: glen.roberts@trade.gov
Website: http://www.export.gov/california/kern​

Kern Staff

Glen Roberts, USEAC Director

Phone: 661-637-0136
Fax: 661-637-0156
Email: Glen.Roberts@trade.gov​


Industries:Agricultural Chemicals, Agricultural Machinery & Eq., Agricultural Services, Air Conditioning/Refrigeration Eq., Aircraft/Aircraft Parts, Airport/Ground Support Eq., Architectural/Constr./Engineering SVC, Automobile/Light Truck/Vans, Automotive Parts/Services Eq., Building Products, Business Eq. (Non-Computer), Chemical Production Machinery, Composite Materials, Computer Services, Computer Software, Computers/Peripherals, Construction Eq., Consumer Electronics, Cosmetics/Toiletries, Defense Industry Eq., Dental Eq., Drugs/Pharmaceuticals, Education/Training Services, Electrical Power Systems, Electronic Commerce, Electronic Components, Electronics Industry Prod/Test Eq., Employment Services, Food Processing/Packaging Eq., Foods - Processed, Forestry/Woodworking Machinery, Franchising, General Consumer Goods, General Industrial Eq./Supplies, General Science & Technology, General Services, Giftware, Health Care Services, Hotel/Restaurant Eq., Household Consumer Goods, Industrial Chemicals, Information Services, Iron/Steel, Jewelry, Laboratory Scientific Instruments, Lawn/Garden Eq., Machine Tools/Metalworking Eq., Management Consulting Services, Materials Handling Machinery, Medical Eq., Mining Industry Eq., Musical Instruments, Non-Ferrous Metals, Oil/Gas Field Machinery, Oil/Gas/Mineral Prod/Explor Serv., Operations/Maintenance Services, Packaging Eq., Paper/Paperboard, Pet Foods/Supp., Photographic Eq., Plastics Materials/Resins, Plastics Production Machinery, Pleasure Boats/Accessories, Pollution Control Eq., Printing/Graphic Arts Eq., Process Controls - Industrial, Pulp/Paper Machinery, Pumps/Valves/Compressors, Railroad Eq., Regulations, Renewable Energy Eq., Robotics, Security/Safety Eq., Sporting Goods/Recreational Eq., Telecommunications Eq., Telecommunications Services, Textile Machinery/Eq., Textile Products - Made-Up, Tools - Hand/Power, Toys/Games, Trade Promotion Services, Transportation Serv. (other than Aviation), Travel/Tourism Services, Trucks/Trailers/Buses, Used/Reconditioned Eq., Veterinary Medicine Eq./Supplies, Water Resources Eq./Services

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Bakersfield U.S. Export Assistance Center.
